_comments.exclude_directories: List of directory names to skip entirely (recursive).
_comments.include_extensions: List of file extensions to include (e.g. ['py', 'md']). Leading dots are optional.
_comments.exclude_extensions: List of file extensions to ignore.
_comments.output_file: Default path to write aggregated text. Set to null to use clipboard.
_comments.no_copy: If true, disables clipboard copying by default.
_comments.stdout: If true, prints aggregated text to the terminal by default.
